attributes.action: Introduce a new uniform for London Academy
attributes.additional_details: The current uniform which includes a navy blue blazer, jumper, cotton shirt and tie leaves the students feeling uncomfortable and more irritated. But by introducing a new light-coloured polo shirt, it would decrease the stress of the students. The polo shirt would take a lot of the weight off the students and decrease pressure of the teachers.
attributes.background: There needs to be lighter uniform for the warm summer and spring seasons. There have been more frequent and extreme heatwaves, which results in students becoming over-heated and stressed for lessons and exams. I would strongly suggest introducing a new polo shirt, which is effective to keep us cool.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of London Academy.
